## Slides
```{r, echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE}

# sourced from https://github.com/jthomasmock/themockup-blog/blob/master/static/resources/resources.qmd
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(dplyr)
  library(reactable)
})

data_in <- tibble::tribble(
  ~Project, ~url, ~Type, ~Description,
  "Dissertation pre-defense seminar", "https://connor-french.com//static/slides/dissertation.html", "Slides", "An overview of my PhD dissertation research",
  
) %>% 
  filter(Type == "Slides") %>% 
  select(-Type)

data_in %>%
  reactable::reactable(
    searchable = TRUE,
    pagination = TRUE,
    language = reactableLang(
    searchPlaceholder = "Filter",
    ),
    columns = list(
      Project = colDef(
        name = "Title",
        minWidth = 150,
        cell = function(value, index) {
          url_in <- data_in$url[index]
          htmltools::a(href = url_in, value)
        }
      ),
      url = colDef(show = FALSE),
      Description = colDef(minWidth = 250)
    ),
    theme = reactableTheme(
      borderColor = "#dfe2e5",
      stripedColor = "#f6f8fa",
      highlightColor = "#f0f5f9",
      cellPadding = "8px 12px",
      style = list(fontFamily = "-apple-system, Lato, sans-serif",
        fontSize = "16px"),
    )
  )
```
